review: Took hardly any time for setting up and casting on the television from mobile/computer. Casting from apps supported by Chromecast like Youtube/Netflix is impeccable. Would give a 5 rating for that. However there are delays streaming from apps not supported by Chromecast. FOr instance when you play videos from other online websites like Megashare.com, etc. Also casting the entire screen of the computer or hand-held device, instead of just the app, is also not working properly - delays, lack of clarity, etc. Dont think it is a problem with wi-fi since the same video plays fine without any delays on the computer or ipad. This is the only reason am giving a rating of 4.Otherwise i am thoroughly delighted with this purchase. And for the price it is a must own. Youtube/Netflix/AmazonVideo watchers would love this.
